home.title: Do you also have one of “those questions”?
home.description: Those Questions is a Q&A-platform to provide you with answers to your questions about growing up, identity, relationships, and sex from people you can relate to.

actionbuttons.addit_det: Thank you! We will get to your question as soon as possible.

answerdetails.explicit_content: The following content may include explicit language and/or deal with explicit topics.
answerdetails.click_dismiss: Only click to dismiss this warning if you feel comfortable to watch it.

youtubeadvice.yt_description: If you're afraid someone is looking over your shoulder, just press the YouTube button and search for your favourite song.

followupquestions.answer_soon: We will answer your question within a week.
followupquestions.want_notification: Do you want a notification when your question is answered?
followupquestions.email_notif: I want to receive an email notification.
followupquestions.push_notif: I want to receive a notification in my phone.
followupquestions.more_info: We would like to ask you some more information to answer your question better. However, this is not required.
followupquestions.additional_details: Is there anything else you'll like to share with us or that you want to add?
followupquestions.extra_question: Do you have any other questions?
followupquestions.privacy_reminder: You can always visit the {0} page to change your notification settings.

answers.title: Answers
answers.explanation: Many adolescents have similar questions like you. Here you can read submitted questions by others and the answers already given by our ambassadors
answers.explain_nsfw: Some answers contain videos or pictures, and some of these could make you feel uncomfortable. We want you to decide for yourself and only watch those things when you are sure that you feel okay with it. We have marked any explicit content with a warning. You may dismiss that warning at any moment and/or completely disable it from your {0} section
answers.no_results: There are no results available for your search. Please try searching for a different term.

about.title: About
about.description: Puberty often comes with questions about one’s own body, feelings or relationships. {0} is a platform where teenagers from all countries and cultures can submit questions about puberty, relationships, sexuality and sex. The questions are then answered by {1} who have often had similar experiences when they had to settle in Germany.
about.description_old: During puberty, one has many questions about one's own body, feelings or relationships. Those Questions is a peer-based platform where all teenagers from different countries and cultures can ask their questions about puberty, relationships, sexuality and sex. These questions are answered by young people who also come from different cultures. They often had similar experiences when they came to Germany and had to settle in Germany.
about.about_project_old: The project is led by a young international team (Germany, Chile, India, Netherlands). All team members have been working for a long time in culturally sensitive sex education.
about.about_project:
The project is led by a young international team who have all been working in culturally sensitive education for a long time and includes people coming from Germany, Chile, India, and Belgium.

Funding comes from the Prototype Fund, which connects iterative software development to government funding.

ambassadors.title: Ambassadors
ambassadors.description: The ambassadors are committed, young people who want to provide answers and perspectives to your questions.
ambassadors.nick_bio: I believe everyone has the right to adequate sex-education. Growing up in India, my puberty was full of myths around sex. I want teenagers to get better information than what I got, to support them with their concerns. Two years ago, I moved to Sweden. It took me a while to get used to the new cultural signals and find my own place in the country. By now, I feel at home here and look forward to the coming years to come.
ambassadors.zain_bio: Access to information about health, hygiene and sex is needed to make informed decisions – independently of age and no matter where one comes from. I think sex-education is something you will truly be using for the rest of your life as it plays a role in forming one’s own confidence, self-worth and identy. I am eager to support this journey!
ambassadors.cta: Do you think you will like to be an ambassador and help other young people in the adventure of growing up? Please send us an email at contact@thosequestions.de and we'll get in touch with you to see how can you support the project.

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.subheader: You are in control of your personal data.
privacy.description:
We ask you to opt-in before we use any of your personal data for this website. If you do not opt-in, we will not collect, store, or use any personal data in our server.

We differentiate between two types of data: the things you send to our server, and the things that are kept in your local storage and are not processed by us, but remain in your own device.

If you have any questions or problems, you can always reach to us in contact@thosequestions.de.
privacy.incognito_instructions:
If you want to browse this site (and the web) without your browser remembering your activity, you can do so by accessing the Incognito or Private mode.

TODO: ADD MORE OF THIS
privacy.notifications_explanation:
Whenever you send a question and/or any additional details, that information is stored in our servers. If you include your email address for notifications, it will be stored and kept link with your question so we can send you a notification. This processing is, however, done automatically, and none of our Ambassadors or the rest of the team is able to see your email.

When you subscribe to receive a phone notification, a subscription event is generated in our server and in your device, so whenever the question is answered, your device will automatically let you know. We do not keep any personal data about your phone other than the subscription event. It is impossible for us to track down your location, phone number, or any other personal data.
privacy.notifications_email: I want to receive an email notification whenever the questions I ask are answered.
privacy.notifications_push: I want to receive a notification in my device whenever the questions I ask are answered.
privacy.offline_data_explanation:
Most information is actually stored and processed locally in your own device, without us having access to it unless you share it by sending a question. We keep track locally of your preferences about explicit content, language, and notifications.

A local copy of the website is stored in your device so you can use it while being offline. This local copy allows you to read any answered question while being offline, but it won't save any associated media (i.e. YouTube videos and/or images) in your phone.

If, for whatever reason, you want to delete this, you can do so here. Any information won't be re-downloaded until you navigate and/or decide to share it again.
